a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.brevity_code AS "brevityCode", a.is_weight AS "isWeight", a.weight_no AS "weightNo", a.agency_id AS "agency.id", a.category_id AS "category.id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag",
